item.title: 003 - Analyzing a C2 agent - Part 1: The Dropper
item.description: In this first part, we will analyze a malicious macro containing an embedded C2 agent. We will analyze how it acts, what techniques it uses to hinder analysis, and how we can obtain indicators of compromise from it.

item.title: 002 - Analyzing a Malicious Macro
item.description: In this article we analyze from scratch a malicious macro that has an embedded bind shell using static and dynamic analysis techniques.

item.title: 001 - Intro
item.description: Introduction to the blog, where I plan to document the different techniques one can use when analyzing malware, both statically and dynamically.

item.title: Contact me
item.description: Did you find anything wrong with my analysis? Did I missed something? Do you just want to say hi? You can send me an email to contact@threatanatomy.io. Thank you!
